bwwExcerpt: Throughout the course of its taut 70 minutes, the remarkable Is This A Room, opening tonight at Broadway's Lyceum Theatre, prompts a steady, gut-churning stream of 'what ifs' as audiences do exactly what whistleblower Reality Winner did during her 2017 FBI interrogation: We second-guess, we attempt to predict, we consider and reconsider every angle, we panic.
